resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40b2660c-5540-44a7-2ed0-f7d34be933eb#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Pantokrátor, 5. század, Galla Placidia-mauzóleum a bejárat felől, Ravenna, mozaik.</string>
            <string language="en">Pantocrator, 5th century, from the entrance mausoleum of Galla Placidia, Ravenna, mosaic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pantocrator, 5. Jahrhundert, vom Eingang Mausoleum 
von Galla Placidia, Ravenna, Mosaik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pantocrator, 5ème siècle, du mausolée 
d'entrée du galla Placidia, Ravenne, mosaïque</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pantocrator, ö século, do mausoleum da entrada do
Galla Placidia, Ravenna, mosaic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pantocrator, quinto secolo, dal mausoleum 
dell'entrata del galla Placidia, Ravenna, mosaico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Pantocrator, 5$ος αιώνας, από το μαυσωλείο εισόδων
Galla Placidia, Ραβένα, μωσαϊκό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pantocrator, 5to siglo, del mausoleo de la entrada
del galla Placidia, Ravena, mosaico</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A ravennai mozaikok egyik szép példája, részlete: a Pantokrátor, a Világbíró alakja.</string>
            <string language="en">One of the nice examples of the mosaics of Ravenna, details: the Pantocrator, the figure of the Judge of the world</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Galla Placidia,  Krisztus,  a világbíró,  Pantokratór,  Pantokrátor,  </string>
            <string language="en">Galla Placidia, Christ, the Judge of the world, Pantocrator, Pantocrator</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eins der netten Beispiele der Mosaiken von 
Ravenna, Details: das Pantocrator, die Abbildung des Richters 
der Welt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un des exemples gentils des mosaïques de 
Ravenne, détails : le Pantocrator, la figure du juge du monde</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um dos exemplos agradáveis dos mosaics de Ravenna,
detalhes: o Pantocrator, a figura do juiz do mundo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Uno degli esempi piacevoli dei mosaici di 
Ravenna, particolari: il Pantocrator, la figura del giudice del 
mondo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα από τα συμπαθητικά παραδείγματα των μωσαϊκών της
Ραβένας, λεπτομέρειες: το Pantocrator, ο αριθμός του 
δικαστή του κόσμου</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Uno de los ejemplos agradables de los mosaicos de 
Ravena, detalles: el Pantocrator, la figura del juez del mundo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Galla Placidia, Christ, der Richter der Welt, 
Pantocrator, Pantocrator</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Galla Placidia, le Christ, le juge du monde, 
Pantocrator, Pantocrator</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Galla Placidia, Christ, juiz do mundo, Pantocrator, 
Pantocrator</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Galla Placidia, Christ, il giudice del mondo, 
Pantocrator, Pantocrator</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Galla Placidia, Χριστός, ο δικαστής του κόσμου, 
Pantocrator, Pantocrator</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Galla Placidia, Cristo, el juez del mundo, Pantocrator, 
Pantocrator</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>

            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

        <metaMetadata>

        org:Sulinet

      </lom>
